content: > the written instructions for this shawl are available for ** free on my blog 1 ** the downloadable pdf listed here for sale contains written instructions and charts **facebook group** i have a facebook group where i provide support for all my patterns - join the group 2 **skill level** intermediate **about the pattern** i made this shawl when i was learning tunisian mosaic crochet it was one of the first few projects that i made in a triangle i designed it to be a mosaic sampler that is made up of 5 different repeating patterns and it was a lot of fun to see how the different patterns worked up i also experimented with a new border - this shawl features an i-cord border and i love how it turned out my shawl has an amazing drape and is nice and warm i hope you will enjoy making it as much as i did **what you need to know** tunisian simple stitch 8 front post extended tunisian simple stitch 9 how to change color at the beginning of a forward pass 10 **what the pattern contains** 1 written pattern 2 mosaic crochet chart with x s to indicate the front post extended simple stitches **sharing on social media** if you decide to share your projects on social media i would love to see them please tag your posts with ** @knitterknotter 5 #knitterknotter 6 #madewithknitterknotter 7 ** **blog** you can find all my patterns on my blog here https //knitterknotter com/patterns/ please do not copy or redistribute this pattern you may sell finished items but please credit the pattern to me arunima goel @ knitterknotter i will be happy to see your finished product s join my facebook group to share pictures of your work and to get any help you might need https //www facebook com/groups/knitterknotterhangout/ you can follow me on my blog to get updates on new patterns https //knitterknotter com **discounts** you can always find the following discounts in my shop buy 2 patterns and get 10% off add 2 patterns to your cart buy 3 patterns and get 15% off add 3 patterns to your cart buy 4 patterns and get 1 pattern of value up to $5 free add 5 patterns to your cart and the one with the lowest price will be free > this is a pattern only and not a completed
